headlines.description: Liverpool's first home game of the season ended in a 2-0 win over Burnley on Saturday, with Diogo Jota and Sadio Mane on target.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jota, Mane strike as Liverpool see off Burnley

headlines.description: A brilliant volley by Danny Ings and an Anwar El Ghazi penalty gave Aston Villa an easy 2-0 victory over a poor Newcastle United side.
headlines.shortLinkText: Glorious Ings volley helps Villa to 2-0 win over Newcastle

headlines.description: Crystal Palace were held to a goalless home draw by promoted Brentford in the Premier League on Saturday in a game short on quality.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace held by Brentford in goalless stalemate

headlines.description: Leeds United winger Raphinha blasted in a second-half equaliser as the battling Yorkshire side came back twice to secure a 2-2 draw with Everton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Raphinha rocket earns Leeds 2-2 home draw against Everton

headlines.description: Jack Grealish scored on his Manchester City home debut as they eased to a 5-0 win over Norwich on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Grealish nets on home debut in big Man City win

headlines.description: Brighton moved joint top of the Premier League after Shane Duffy and Neal Maupay goals earned them a 2-0 home win against Watford on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton ease past Watford to go joint top
